name: Space Shooter (itch) (man_gola)
description:
Title: Space Shooter

Platform: PC

Genre: Side Scroller

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 8+

Game Overview: The goal is to have the highest score. You increase your score by shooting falling enemies before they can fall onto you. 

 Instructions: Use the arrow keys to move around and spacebar to shoot.   

Game Design Team 

Thomas Nguyen – Game Designer
